answers.answer: I don't understand what still affects your mother, something related to the bypass surgery?Most people, well at least a lot of them, over 50 have increased heart rhythm abnormalities.  My bottom-line here is a few skipped beats is most likely not dangerous or even serious. still it is worth getting a doctor to listen to it, perhaps to do an EKG.  Given your mother had bypass, she must have a cardiologist contact, that's the best specialist to have check the skip.
